summary: BATTERY / ALTERNATOR LIGHT CAME ON AND STAYED ON WHILE DRIVING. THIS OCCURRED THREE TIMES : FIRST ON 4/26/00 AT 4332 MILES, SECOND ON 4/24/01 AT 16674 MILES AND LAST ON 7/5/01 AT 20427 MILES. EACH TIME THE CAR WAS REPAIRED BY A FORD DEALER AT NO COST UNDER WARRANTY.**** DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/01 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****748178. *AK
